title: Tofu houmous
ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic', '2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '225g (8 oz) tofu', '3 lemons, juiced', '1/2 bunch parsley', '175g (6 oz) tahini', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch ground cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
